results.content: This is not a course that will teach you how to code. It will teach you how to copy code from other sources and jimmyrig that code to make it kinda do what you want. It only covers the very basics of building a site using Foundation, mostly copying and pasting code from the Foundation website and moving so fast that you constantly have to scrub backwards to see what he did. Instructor is also very poor at using words to describe what he is doing. He says things like "we'll paste that here" instead of "we'll paste the code we copied into the body of the webpage" which makes it difficult to code and follow instructions at the same time as he is talking. You have to watch, pause, do, rewind, watch again, pause, do, continue watching several times for each clip. It's an informative course that will help you practice your skills, but the quality of actual instruction could be better.
